topic.title: Introduction
topic.shortdesc: The troubleshooting features were introduced in DITA 1.3 and later enhanced in DITA 2.0.

body.p: This publication focuses on DITA 2.0. It is an update to a white paper authored by Bob Thomas and published by the OASIS DITA Adoption Committee in 2014: DITA 1.3 Feature Article: Using DITA 1.3 Troubleshooting.
For DITA 2.0, the DITA Technical Committee added elements to the content model of the troubleshooting topic to enable technical communicators to provide diagnostic information.
